name: Lasso: The Squidmish
description:
For a better experience we recommend downloading the game instead of playing it on the web.

Lasso: The Squidmish

Little Cowboy has to survive the incoming waves of the Squids and Bolts as much as he can. Use the lasso and your revolver to defend yourself.

Controls:

  • WASD or Arrow Keys to move.
  • LMB to shoot.
  • RMB to lasso.

Made by two people: Zugarra and Bunnie.
